about_the_game:
Are you an Aperture Science employee?
Then you NEED this program!

Whether you just want to chat with your colleagues via our secure messaging, control testing rooms remotely, fill out our forms to earn rewards or even store your files* in Aperture Science's massive database!
*Your storage space is limited, but can be increased according to different criteria.

With the Aperture Remote Terminal, your work has never been easier!


A full list of Aperture Remote Terminal features is available below.



I don't have much time, this version of the Aperture Remote Terminal is not complete. This is a version modified by me to add small details that you will have to find. These hidden details are important, they will allow you to understand our entire history, and perhaps even help us...
I have to leave, my access will be revoked.
But if I can make changes, I will. I have other ways to access this platform.

-Marcus Saveurs



  • Creating/Filling out Forms
  • Instant Messaging
  • File Explorer
  • Creating/Editing Notes
  • Creation of Projects
  • Multiple Servers
  • Administration
  • History of the Various Operations Carried out on the ART
  • Control of Test Chambers
  • Security
  • Communication
  • Buildings Control
  • Various Settings
  • Lots of Other Things!
